name: Cave Game (Aoggs)
description:
cave game is a game i made for ludum dare 52

here is the part where id usually say i made the game 48 or 72 hours

but il be honest iv been super busy so i only had a bit of time to work on the 

game so i had to cut almost all the game so woops

anyway in this game you play as billy a young girl who has never seen or heard 

of the surface but soon she and her friend kai might be seeing the surface

for the first time ever
